title: Stage Lv6-D1-S01
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: The contracting parties shall comply with the following terms. (professional variant 1)
This agreement shall be legally binding. (professional variant 1)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 계약 당사자는 다음 조건을 준수해야 합니다. (전문 1)
sentences.en: The contracting parties shall comply with the following terms. (professional variant 1)
This agreement shall be legally binding. (professional variant 1)

sentences.kr: 계약 위반 시 손해배상 책임이 발생합니다. (전문 1)
sentences.en: Breach of contract shall result in liability for damages. (professional variant 1)
Disputes shall be resolved through arbitration proceedings. (professional variant 1)
The competent court shall govern this contract. (professional variant 1)
The indemnity clause applies to specific circumstances. (professional variant 1)

sentences.kr: 계약 해지 통지는 서면으로 해야 합니다. (전문 1)
sentences.en: Termination notice shall be provided in writing. (professional variant 1)
Warranty provisions are specified in the contract. (professional variant 1)
Fiduciary duties shall not be breached. (professional variant 1)
Legal precedent applies to this case. (professional variant 1)
